alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 07 at 4:26AM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 mph. Higher gusts possible on ridges and peaks. The strongest winds are expected to the south of Grande Ronde. * WHERE...Coast Range of Northwest Oregon and Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel may be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon
